description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref: P1475.22 dated 16/01/24 to allow for a reduction in size of the ground floor side extension
decision_conditions: The amendment to the approved application listed below is considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in its own right and not require resubmission of a fresh planning application;
1. Reduction in size of the ground floor side extension.

The applicant is advised that this amendment relates solely to the item detailed above and annotated on drawing numbers 0013/22/PL/01 H, 0013/22/PL/02 G, 0013/22/PL/04 D, 0013/22/PL/05 D, 0013/22/PL/07 C, 0013/22/PL/08 B, 0013/22/PL/09 B and 0013/22/PL/10 B and not to any other deviation from the approved drawings. Furthermore this amendment does not in any way alter or remove any previous conditions imposed on the original approved application reference P1475.22.
